title: Fevered Sleep
body:
Fevered Sleep is on a mission to make the world a more caring, curious, compassionate place, one unlikely art project at a time.

This wonderful site was created by Bristol-based studio **Noughts & Ones.**

Bristol-based creative development studio that craft remarkable Squarespace & Shopify websites.

Check them out [here](https://www.feveredsleep.co.uk/)!
